sentences.english: Damage increases as the attack is charged longer.
sentences.chinese: 攻擊力隨蓄力時間的增加而增加。

sentences.english: Grilled Sculpin now correctly grants Ranged Attack Power.
sentences.chinese: 烤肉飯桶現在正確的贈款遠程攻擊力。

sentences.english: Sheva would make an ideal addition to our attack.
sentences.chinese: 舍甫琴柯將給我們的攻擊力增加砝碼。

sentences.english: In terms of attacking potential we've had problems since the start.
sentences.chinese: 攻擊力不足始終是長期困擾着我們的一個問題。

sentences.english: GF also have levels. The higher their levels, the stronger their attacks.
sentences.chinese: GF也有等級，等級越高攻擊力越強。

sentences.english: He attacks the ball so well and it's no surprise he gets himself on the scoresheet from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 他有很好的攻擊力，毫不奇怪他能進那麼多球。

sentences.english: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.chinese: 飛魚導彈是他們最有攻擊力的武器。

sentences.english: Provides scope assisted firing and has advanced long-range power.
sentences.chinese: 提升射程和遠程攻擊力。

sentences.english: The current side is one of the most electrifying in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 當前的這支球隊是歐洲最富攻擊力的球隊之一。

sentences.english: Also doesn't help with base damage to last hit and deny.
sentences.chinese: 並且這對於基礎攻擊力和補刀也是沒有幫助的。

sentences.english: Has advanced short-range power and daze effects.
sentences.chinese: 提升近程攻擊力和眩暈效果。

sentences.english: There is no Heroes IV-style separation of melee and ranged attack types.
sentences.chinese: 與四代不同，不會將攻擊力分爲近身和遠程兩種。

sentences.english: Beast Mastery improves your animal companion's basic attack damage, as well as skills that help to keep your companion from harm.
sentences.chinese: 野獸專精提高您的野獸基礎攻擊力以及減少所受傷害。

sentences.english: Battlecruiser damage vs. ground decreased from 10 to 8.
sentences.chinese: 大和的對地攻擊力從10點降低到8點。

sentences.english: Has strengthened long-range power and ups critical hit.
sentences.chinese: 提升遠程攻擊力和暴擊率。

definition: prefix or suffix of a compound word/affix (linguistics)
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
